snippet: In an intense game with major playoff-seeding implications, the Atlanta Hawks were down 12 to the visiting Boston Celtics in the third quarter. That's when Paul Millsap took over....
lead_paragraph: In an intense game with major playoff-seeding implications, the Atlanta Hawks were down 12 to the visiting Boston Celtics in the third quarter. That's when Paul Millsap took over.

headline.main: Millsap Sparks Hawks Fightback Against Boston
headline.print_headline: Millsap Sparks Hawks Fightback Against Boston
